review: It was my first visit to the clinic. Dr. Sushma did a thorough check up and explained me about the procedures she will be carrying out.  The RCT went very well and I am more than satisfied with the treatment. I will surely recommend Dr. Sushma from Dr. Teeth clinic to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Firstly, dr made me comfortable by saying she will treat by my pace, give breaks if i need.she explained all the course of treatment, and agreed to give appointment as per my suitable time . Her skills were noted at every point during the treatment, Thank you dr now I am not having pain , love you!!
